resources.string:
"About this app:

This app was created using the Android Studio.

Many thanks to all the people who have uploaded the sounds to make our lives even more funny!"
Check this if you do not want to send any anonymous data to improve this application.

GiantTree © 2016. All rights reserved.

Uses Guava library for Android by Google.
Uses Fabric by Twitter.

"

What\'s new:

New sounds!

Get hyped for new sounds, including John Cena and more.

"

We are using device identifiers to personalize contents and ads, offer functions for social media and analyze our app\'s usage. Apart from that, we also provide those identifiers and other information about your device to our partners for social media, advertisement and analysis. Learn more: http://www.google.com/intl/policies/privacy/partners/.
